category.name: Attribute Sharing

preference.name: ATTRSHARING_max_rows_expected
preference.preference_description: Defines the maximum number of rows that can be returned from a result set. If the return exceeds the number of rows defined by this preference, an error message appears. Valid values are Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a positive integer.
